name: Kinnek
tag_list: procurement, business-purchasing, small-businesses, marketplace, platform, b2b
description: Online B2B purchasing platform for SMBs
overview:
Kinnek is a B2B platform that allows small businesses to request and receive customized quotes from suppliers for their purchases.

Getting quotes for major purchases is currently a very ad hoc and antiquated process for small businesses. They do not have the same resources as a large corporation or institution to maintain large procurement teams and implement enterprise-level procurement platforms. However, they also do not have the luxury of easily finding quotes online for their purchases- commercial-quantity pricing and pricing on customized orders are difficult to find.

Kinnek enables these small businesses to request quotes from many suppliers using a single request, for any major purchase. The process of requesting quotes, submitting quotes, and the resulting interaction between SMBs and their suppliers is all handled online through the Kinnek platform.
